name: SAMOSBOR 2D
detailed_description:
"SAMOSBOR 2D" is a side-shooter platformer in which you have to shoot a lot of enemies at the levels of a huge building. Solve puzzles to successfully complete levels. Collect weapons and equipment to effectively resist hordes of bloodthirsty monsters. Survive - the main goal.

Game features:
- Large and intricate levels, for the passage of which it is necessary to solve many puzzles;
- Different types of enemies with unique combat skills;
- A huge set of weapons and equipment to choose from, each of which has a different technical characteristics;
- Game Mode: Survival. Hold on to one of the available Arenas for as long as possible;
- A huge number of sound effects that immerse you in the gameplay;
- A huge number of achievements;
- Dynamic soundtrack.
